text: The 2018 Balkan Athletics Indoor Championships was the 23rd edition of the annual track and field competition for athletes from the Balkans, organised by Balkan Athletics. It was held on 17 February 2018 at the Ataköy Athletics Arena in Istanbul, Turkey.About Romania topped the medal table, winning 15 medals including 5 gold, ahead of the host nation Turkey, and Bulgaria.Medal table ==Men's results== ===Track=== {| |- |60 metres |Emre Zafer Barnes || 6.62 NR |Efthymios Stergioulis || 6.71 |Konstantinos Zikos || 6.72 |- |400 metres |Robert Parge || 47.28
